explains: n. 亏损，赤字，不足额；（体育用语）失分数；缺乏，缺陷
wordGroup: trade deficit n. 贸易逆差；贸易赤字
water deficit 水分亏缺；缺水量
current account deficit 收支往来帐户赤字；经常账目赤字
attention deficit hyperactivity disorder 过动症，注意力不足过动症；过度活跃症
financial deficit 财政赤字；预算赤字
attention deficit disorder 注意缺失紊乱；注意力缺损/缺失症
deficit spending （尤指政府的）赤字开支；寅吃卯粮
foreign trade deficit 对外贸易逆差
saturation deficit 饱和差；饱和不足量；饱和亏缺

sentences.en: The deficit had grown with the connivance of the banks.
sentences.cn: 在银行纵容下，赤字增加。

sentences.en: He promised to get to work on the state's massive deficit.
sentences.cn: 他承诺着手处理该国严重的赤字问题。

sentences.en: Taxes only get part of the way toward a $50 billion deficit.
sentences.cn: 税收只会部分解决500亿美元的赤字。
